name: The Crucible [Redux] #03
description:
The Crucible translates a persistent psychological state, reflective of our contemporary anxieties. The work uses an array of sonic frequencies to influence procedural geometry set within an infinite space, specifically reinterpreted for the Tezo blockchain.

Format: mp4. video file 
Duration: 30second loop
Dimensions: 1920 x 1920px
Sound: Stereo Mix
